history.proof: apply mk_monoid. - intros x. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z. - intros x. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z. - intros x y z. apply Z.add_assoc.

exceptions.tactic: destruct x; simpl; rewrite Z.add_0_r; reflexivity.

original: apply mk_monoid. - intros x. destruct x; simpl; rewrite Z.add_0_r; reflexivity. - intros x. simpl. rewrite Z.add_0_l. reflexivity. - intros x y z. apply Z.add_assoc.
